name: Watch out for the asteroids!
description:
CONTROLS:

a/left arrow - slow down

d/right arrow - speed up

w/up arrow - steer left

s/down arrow - steer right

GOAL:

Survive for as long as possible and get a highscore!

You get 1000 score boost if you can make the enemy run into the asteroid!

MUSIC:

Feeling lonely without any SFX or Music? I enjoy this game mostly when listening to some retrowave mix!! I recommend this one:

Decided to join last minute for Crimson Jam, made something quickly with a retro feel to it, inspired by Atari Asteroids.
